description: Chocolate's playful declaration of being 'mint' for each other is a sweet twist.
title: Mint to Be
n_1: Chocolate lounges next to Mint Leaf in a cozy confectionery.
n_2: Mint Leaf flutters closer, intrigued by Chocolate's aroma.
c1_2: We blend so well, don't we?
n_3: They come together, creating a delightful combination.
n_4: Their bond symbolizes a perfect blend of flavors and love.
c1_4: To us, being mint for each other!
